nodes.text: Arven Ershall was a lieutenant of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY Ershall was part of Satele Shan's forces that entered into a temporary alliance with Imperials loyal to Darth Marr. Ershall was initially skeptical about the truce.
Arven Ershall was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, where Ershall sends Imperial players a message if they choose to have Satele Shan interrogate Iven instead of Marr.
